title: Bookings surge ahead of Anand Mahotsav in Ayodhya
description: RateGain Travel Technologies Limited said following the announcement of the inauguration date of the Ram Mandir in Ayodhya in the second week of September, rapid bookings ensued, and there has been a 121% year-over-year rise in international bookings in Lucknow for the weekend preceding the inauguration. When comparing month-over-month bookings, September recorded a 270% increase in international bookings compared to August.
